modName: Male Forsworn Armor For Females - Replacer
summary: Allows females to wear the headdress, gauntlets and boots that male Forsworn wear.
descriptionHtml:
[heading][color=red][b][u]Male Forsworn Armor For Females - Replacer[/u][/b][/color][/heading]

A quick mod I did for personal use, but thought I'd share it anyway. When I was playing my Bosmer, I completely forgot that the female Forsworn armor is skimpy and complete impractical, and I get a dorky circlet-thing instead of the cool one the males wear.

So I simply replaced the one the female Forsworn have with the male gauntlets, boots and headdress. This is a replacer so ALL female forsworn will wear it. "What about the curiass?" you ask. Well, since I have no experience with creating armor so I'll point you to the mod I use, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23230/? ] Iceburg's Modesty Mod[/url], which provides a better Forsworn outfit.

[color=darkorange]===[b]Installation:[/b]====[/color]

Just drop the file into your data folder. Or use the NMM.
To uninstall, just remove the file.

[color=darkorange]=====[b]Permissions and Credits[/b]=====[/color]

This mod is not to be uploaded anywhere but the Skyrim Nexus. Please report to me if you see this anywhere else.
Thanks to Bethesda for creating a great game and letting us fiddle with it.

[color=red]Thanks for reading and check my page for more mods![/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7065334/?tb=mods&pUp=1 ] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2dryws3.png[/IMG][/url]
author: TaeRai
